quotes: The African Union spearheads Africa’s development and integration in close collaboration with African Union Member States, the Regional Economic Communities and African citizens.

assembled_events.notes: The role of Secretary-General of the OAU is clearly a career position, with specific responsibilities and duties.

issues.description: The time_marker_ids [3, 6] correspond to dates '3 April 1994' and 'June 1996', but the supporting quotes indicate the role of Secretary-General of the OAU was held at least until 2001, suggesting incomplete or incorrect time markers.
The supporting quotes only mention the role of Secretary-General of the OAU in specific contexts (1994 and 2001) but do not explicitly confirm the full duration of the position.
